title: Got the 10 year Icon but no Skin?
body:
Hello there! I already have Kayle and the Riot kayle skin before the event started. I had her since the pax code that she was given in. So about 2 years or so? Whenever she first came out anyways.... Well today I got my summoner icon but no mystery skin with it? I looked through all my skins and purchase history but there is nothing here D:! Was not sure if they missed it or if they are deploying icons separately then the skins? Here are some screenshots! So if a Riot staff member could help me I would be grateful :D!

http://i.imgur.com/2QLtBXL.png

http://i.imgur.com/vpU1ROb.png

replies.body: Gifts are being sent separately, so you wont' get everything all at once.  We'll be providing updates at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang on until gifts are done rolling out!
YOu da real MVP i came here worried about that i want to thank you for clearing this up even though im not the owner of this Discussion :D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I haven't got my random mystery skin....
Accounts do not receive each gift at the same time, they are being done separately. The last day for the gifts is the 23rd, so if you do not receive it by then, you can submit a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=M6PuuEAK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-17T03:18:37.511+0000)
>
> Accounts do not receive each gift at the same time, they are being done separately. The last day for the gifts is the 23rd, so if you do not receive it by then, you can submit a support ticket.

Oh okay I thought they came in together because my friend got her icon and skin same time D:! So I was a bit concerned!
